name: Nicole Paz
body: # Nicole Paz ### Coding Experience [Dev Bootcamp](http://devbootcamp.com): Fox Squirrels, Fall 2013 [Deal Location API](https://github.com/fox-squirrels-2013/location-api): Simple API that provides local deals. Currently uses seed data only. [Actor Assault](https://github.com/gd7627a/Impeccable-Taste): Pits two actors against one another, using their popularity to determine the winner. [DnD Faker Gem](http://rubygems.org/gems/faker_dnd): Small gem that generates classes, races, and professions for Dungeons and Dragons players. [Craigslist Jr in Rails](https://github.com/fox-squirrels-2013/tom_nicole_craigslist_rails/tree/friendly_id_implementation): The first Rails project. It allows users to create posts in categories, and provides an obfuscated URL to allow the poster to edit or delete the post privately. ### Non-Coding Projects [NWA Game Developer Group](http://www.meetup.com/NWA-Game-Developer-Group/): Collaborated to make a video game. Said game never launched. CATV: Created graphics and edited video for a local access television program. ### Social Media Profiles: [](https://www.facebook.com/nicolejpaz) [](http://twitter.com/NJPaz) [](https://plus.google.com/u/0/106098982788631235174/posts) [](http://www.linkedin.com/pub/nicole-paz/38/a36/a16)
